question: What percent growth of GSDP was noticed in Uttar Pradesh in FY 2018-19?
explanation: A growth of 6.5% was noticed in Uttar Pradesh in FY 2018-19. Sector-wise growth- Agricultural- 3.5%, Manufacturing- 5.9%, Services- 7.8%. All data were calculated by taking the base year 2011-12 (constant prices).
